content:
"Who, me? I'm doing fine," Raemon says, unconsciously rubbing his eyes. The dark circles under his eyes, his grimy clothes, and his frequent yawning tell a different story. He's likely been running caravans back and forth for days at a time without pausing to rest. Maybe you should encourage Raemon to take a break. In fact, you know just the place.

A) Take Raemon somewhere he can relax for a bit.

Discard all  , and attach the HELPING HAND mission to Raemon.

You tell Raemon to come with you. "Why, do you need help with something?" he offers. You decide not to tell him where you're headed just yet—he would only protest.

Bring Raemon to A Hearty Brew in Spire, then clear him again with  .

B) Wish Raemon the best.

Discard Raemon. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
